short_summary: This is a request for proposal for the design of a new accommodation building at Comox, British Columbia, Canada from Defence Construction Canada under a Category SRV, for an estimated construction cost of CAD 6,000,000.00. The project is open to bidders from Canada and the EU under the CETA agreement. The bidding deadline is January 9, 2023, and proposals should be submitted electronically through the MERX system. Bidders who meet the required criteria will be awarded a contract based on the RFAP where the proponent with the highest total score will be selected.
description: Please refer to the tender description.
duration_in_months: The project is expected to commence in March 2023 and end in September 2023.

_tender_announcement.md_
=====================================================

### Design New Accommodations Building
#### Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP)

#### **Reference Number:**
PW-22-01016845

#### **Notice Type:**
Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)

#### **Industry Classification:**
 Architectural Services, Building Engineering Services

#### **Notice Open Date:**
2022-12-20

#### **Public Notice Closing Date and Time:**
2023-01-09T23:00:00

#### **Background:**
This Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) is undertaken by Defence Construction Canada (DCC) for architectural and engineering consultant services. The project entails the design and construction of a new accommodation building at 19 Wing, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Comox, British Columbia.

#### **Notice Description:**
DCC invites interested proponents to submit Abbreviated Proposals to provide professional services for the following:

*    Preparation of a concept design
*    Design development and construction documents
*    Assistance during the procurement and construction phases

#### **Estimate:**
The estimated construction cost of the project is $6,000,000.00 CAD.

#### **Notice Award:**
A single contract will be awarded based on the established evaluation criteria.

#### **CETA and Trade Agreements:**
The RJ field must indicate if it falls within the bounds of CETA. 
        
#### **Notices of Requirements:**
Proposers may respond to any or all parts of the requirements which they can reasonably offer.

#### **Desktop Review:**
The RFAP and all applicable documents can be reviewed on the MERX Electronic Bidding System.

#### **Restrictions:**
The RFAP requires interested firms to meet the following conditions:

-   The project must be completed using existing permanent staff
-   The contractor has the right to sell the building with a full and complete release of liability

#### **Dates:**
Estimated completion date: March 2023 to September 2023. This RFAP will be cancelled on the **closing date and time** of the public notice. The contract award will be posted on the DCC website.
